app_description_title: â€” a mobile application for drivers and other users
app_description_text: that provides information about current road conditions and possible hazards along your route. With it, you can receive and exchange up-to-date information about accidents, traffic jams, dangerous sections, and other situations that may affect your trip.
faq_register_question: How do I register in the app?
faq_register_answer: To register, you can use your email or sign in through Google. Afterward, you need to enter additional details to complete the registration.
faq_login_question: How do I log into the app?
faq_login_answer: You can log in using your email and password or through Google if you already have an account.
faq_help_question: How does the app help me on the road?
faq_help_answer: Road Radar allows you to exchange information about accidents, traffic jams, dangerous areas, and weather conditions that could impact your journey.
faq_view_incidents_question: How can I view current incidents in my area?
faq_view_incidents_answer: Incidents are displayed on the 'Incidents' page, sorted by date (from the newest) and filtered by your area as indicated in your profile.
faq_report_incident_question: How do I report a new incident?
faq_report_incident_answer: To report a new incident, click the appropriate button in the app and fill out the form with a detailed description of the situation.
faq_profile_question: How do I view and edit my profile?
faq_profile_answer: Profile information can be viewed on the 'Profile' page. There is also a button to edit your details.
faq_settings_question: How do I change the app settings and manage my account?
faq_settings_answer: You can change the app's theme and language in the settings, as well as manage your account settings.
faq_map_incidents_question: How do I view incidents on the map?
faq_map_incidents_answer: Incidents can be viewed on the map, where they are marked with pins. Clicking on a pin will show detailed information about the incident.
faq_data_storage_question: How does the app store my data?
faq_data_storage_answer: Some data is stored locally on the device for faster access and to minimize internet usage, while others are synced with the server to save progress and settings.
faq_technical_problems_question: What should I do in case of technical problems?
faq_technical_problems_answer: Try restarting the app or contact the developer through the contact details below.
